captions: Sirince is a Turkish village located 8 km from the town of Selcuk, up in the hills amidst grapevines and apple orchards.

Living my best life..eating delicious food in a cave pool in Mykonos 😄💙 Does it get any better than this!? Love this amazing cave suite at @cavotagoomykonos 💙 one of the most beautiful hotels! 🇬🇷 #Mykonos

Beautiful Amasra, a small Black Sea port town in the Bartın Province of Turkey. We have spent the day here discovering nearby beaches and eating fresh fish by the sea! 💙 More on my insta stories! Thanks @tcbakka & @kafkatur_
#explorewesternblacksea  #batikaradenizikesfet #amasra #bartin
